name: The Case of the Missing Adventure
overview: An adventure game from the book "Adventure Games for the Commodore 64". It was a dark and gloomy day and the rain was coming down in sheets. Cotton sheets, satin sheets ... I should've stayed in bed! I'd spent several days trying to track down Willy the Kwill, the ultimate in undesirable characters. I'd ended up at the wrong end of a blind alley. Suddenly, a door opened at the end of it and a hand beckoned to me. To be honest, I wasn't sure what to do. I'll leave the choice to you. Press D and I go through the door. Press any other key and I quit the case.
